TopicTitle: KSP Grandmaster! (Land on every body of the Kerbal System!)

Articles.Content:
Currently planning a GRAND TOUR with a single ship carrying all the landers, just have to work out the kinks with the mothership.

I hope to not have to refuel, but that would require a complete weight overhaul of all the craft and a huge drive system.

Expect an entry in the next few weeks... (depending how long i get to play during my 'vacation')
Great, I had to dig up the screenshots.

Currently planning a GRAND TOUR with a single ship carrying all the landers, just have to work out the kinks with the mothership.

I hope to not have to refuel, but that would require a complete weight overhaul of all the craft and a huge drive system.

Expect an entry in the next few weeks... (depending how long i get to play during my 'vacation')

The drive system doesn't have to be that big, check out my tour for some reference.
